name: Megalith Hagith
desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Megalith" card. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Megalith" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field, including this card you control, whose total Levels equal or exceed its Level. You can only use this effect of "Megalith Hagith" once per turn.
